an5.25:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, angehi anuggahita sammaditthi cetovimuttiphala ca hoti cetovimuttiphalanisamsa ca, pannavimuttiphala ca hoti pannavimuttiphalanisamsa ca.
an5.25:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, sammaditthi silanuggahita ca hoti, sutanuggahita ca hoti, sakacchanuggahita ca hoti, samathanuggahita ca hoti, vipassananuggahita ca hoti.
an5.25:2.3: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi angehi anuggahita sammaditthi cetovimuttiphala ca hoti cetovimuttiphalanisamsa ca, pannavimuttiphala ca hoti pannavimuttiphalanisamsa ca”ti.
